summary: This document is a sworn statement from a forensic accountant and private investigator hired by Cohen & Gresser LLP to independently review a Financial Condition Report prepared by Macalvins Accountants summarizing Ghislaine Maxwell's financial condition and assets from 2015-2020. The expert concludes the report is a complete and accurate summary of Maxwell's assets, those of her husband, and assets held in trust for her benefit.

keyFacts: A forensic accountant was hired by Cohen & Gresser LLP to independently verify a Financial Condition Report on Ghislaine Maxwell's assets from 2015-2020.
The expert had complete access to underlying documents and Macalvins accountants to verify the report's accuracy.
The expert concluded the Financial Condition Report was a complete and accurate summary of Maxwell's assets, her husband's assets, and assets held in trust for her benefit.
